title: SHORTS 'N' DRABBLES
description: Welcome to my new world of stories. As before this anthology covers a wide range of genres but with the emphasis on more Shorts and fewer Drabbles. It is bigger and better than before. Some will make you wonder. I say with a little wink. And as you sit and ponder. Take a sip of a well earned drink. So put your feet up, open the book and let the magic of my imagination entertain you. I know that you won't be disappointed.
author: Rick Haynes
